snippet.title: Blind Exposure - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Navigate through claustrophobic, completely dark world illuminated only by scans you manage to create; listen carefully to sounds coming from the darkness, and don’t let dread and paranoia get to you. Watch the creepy trailer for Blind Exposure to see what to expect from this pyschological horror exploration puzzle game. Blind Exposure will be available on PC in Q2 2025.
